sentences.sContent: What prompted you to focus on the Taj Mahal?
sentences.sCn: 是什么促使你把重点放在泰姬陵上呢？

sentences.sContent: I had read about the Taj Mahal in the history books only.
sentences.sCn: 我仅仅在历史书上读到过关于泰姬陵的介绍。

sentences.sContent: The Taj Mahal in India is one of the wonders of the world and is one of the most beautiful mausoleums constructed by the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his favorite queen, Mumtaz Mahal.
sentences.sCn: 印度的泰姬陵是世界奇迹之一也是最美丽的陵墓。 该陵墓是由沙贾汗印度蒙兀儿时期帝国皇帝沙·贾汉建造的，以纪念其最宠爱的王妃--穆姆塔兹·玛哈尔 。
